documents.document:
Golden Triangle Holidays a heavenly tour for Shopaholic

Golden triangle holidays are a quintessence of astonishing India’s culture and history. The mesmeric tour is all about Mughal, Rajput and colonial legacies to Modern India.

The fascinating tour covers the dignified cities of Delhi, Jaipur and Agra to give an exceptional experience of royalty and grandiose.

The tour is a hot favorite with both Indian and international travelers for its extraordinary shopping destinations decked with exotic articles to purchase.

The Shopaholic are the biggest fan and find there utmost satisfaction amidst golden triangle tour of India.

The heart of nation famed as Delhi seems to be the nucleus of shopping extravaganza and gives an insight in to the market orb of stunning India.

The capital city of India is also famous for number of shopping complexes, hubs, whole sale markets scattered all over the Delhi city.

The vacationers can relish on purchases of jewelry, carpets, handicrafts, precious stones, silks and silver ware for which Delhi city is globally admired.

The major shopping hubs in Delhi are Chandini Chowk, Dilli Haat, Sadar Bazar, Karol Bagh, South Extension and Connaught Place.

The pink city of Jaipur is also far famed for its vibrant shopping markets and is a great focal point to stop and shop.

Jaipur is the perfect place to shop for fabric as well as carpets, handicrafts, out of ordinary camel leather items and hypnotically beautiful Jaipur jewelry and gems.

The city of undying love Agra is a grand consign to acquire time-honored artifacts and handicrafts, which makes guests assemble these markets to carry something home. One of the most in style stuff sold in the Agra shops is the facsimile of the Taj Mahal.

The best places to shop in Agra include the Sadar Bazar, Kinaari Bazaar and Munroe Road.

The golden triangle holidays of India is an astounding traverse of unique shopping destinations to travel around and enjoy shopping.

The shopaholic will find it a delightful excursion of exotic shopping articles and items to carry as souvenir back home.

This winter enjoy the most enthralling holiday with golden triangle India to discover the true essence of India.

Bat and Ball Are the Weaponry for the Era of Frivolous Dawn

The stage of clash amongst titans is set for an exciting contest of bat and ball in the tenth edition of Cricket World Cup 2011. The stunning tournament is back to cricket crazy sub continent after 15 long years which is doubtlessly going to be the carnival to cherish for a time immemorial.

Gone are the days when wars were fought with arms and ammunitions in today’s modern context cricket are a best way to dominate the world. This makes the bat and ball the most destructive weaponry of the contemporary world. The bells of cricket battle between hungry cricketing giants have rang and the show is all set to take your breath way.

Enchanting India where cricket is no less than a religion in fact the most followed religion will get a new definition of thrill and excitement. Hold your breath; pull up your socks to witness the most vibrant attacks of cricketing nations which will make its entertaining impact from 17th February 2011 over the world.

Anxious, biting nails, heart beating faster and sweats seems to have a cool effect over you then you are under the infection of most exciting fever of Cricket World Cup 2011. The sure cure to this fever is to pamper self with an enamoring luxury Tours india which will be the ultimate King of entertainments in the midst of blood freezing matches and captivating aspects of cheerful India.

India tour operators will make your dream come true to witness one of the biggest events of this century with its tremendous tailor made packages to suit all economic fragments. Come and explore the majestic India’s timeless grace during this mega event of Cricket World Cup 2011.

Golden Triangle Tours, India’s Eclectic Composition

Tour to three captivating cities of India including Delhi Agra and Jaipur conclude a Golden Triangle Tourof India. It is the best way to explore north India, rich in culture and tradition along with modernity of time.
The sojourn of tri-city begins from the heart of the nation with Delhi Tours. Here you can explore the ageless monuments like India Gate, Red Fort, Qutub Minar, along with spiritual sights such as Akshardham Temple, Lotus Temples, Kalkaji Mandir and many more.
Moving on, the next stop is at Agra, a medieval city on the bank of Yamuna River. The city is popular worldwide for its splendid Mughal Era buildings, attracting thousands of tourists every year. Beside Taj Mahal, you can also relish the sightseeing of Akbar’s Tomb, Fatehpur Sikri, Agra Fort etc during your Agra Tours.
The last destination of the Golden Triangle is the Jaipur, ‘the pink city’. The city is beautifully lined with gardens and parks, forts & palaces. Moreover, the Heritage hotels of Rajasthan, which were formerly the residence of the maharajas, are also worth appreciation. Popular excursions are Hawa Mahal, Jal Mahal, Jantar- Mantar, city Palace etc.

Pick any of the Delhi Luxury Hotels for some Unique Experien

Delhi is well known for its aspiring architecture, spiritual lifestyle, natural splendor and colorful shopping centers. Above all this, the thing which keeps the tourists amazed is Delhi luxury Hotels, which are not only easily accessible but also affordable. There are abundant hotels in the city serving their guests with pleasure.

Some well-known Five Star Deluxe Delhi Hotels are:

1) Hotel Shangri-La: Just minutes from Delhi’s shopping and business center, Shangri-La Eros offers uncompromised beauty every step of the way. All 323 rooms are fully air-conditioned providing all necessary amenities and services dominating international services. From elegant dining to finely appointed rooms, this Luxury Hotel in Delhi never fails to deliver its best services. The restaurant offers a delightful selection of cuisines, enhancing your taste buds.

2) Claridges Hotel: It is among the top most luxury hotels offering a heavenly stay in the utmost of style and sophistication and is easily accessible from domestic and international airports. The rooms and suites in hotel are incredibly decorated and accompanying amenities make it the perfect hotel for both business and leisure. The 162 rooms offer a soothing atmosphere where relaxation occurs naturally. The dining arrangements are made in the known establishments of the hotel including, Dhaba, Pickwick, Tandoor and many more offering you with different varieties of cuisines with distinct taste.

3) Uppal’s Orchid: It is one of the most innovative and eco-friendly hotel in the capital city. The moment you step in you can feel the warmth of Indian hospitality with all modern amenities. Moreover, this Deluxe Delhi Hotel maintains a distinct edge over other hotels in terms of hospitality, environment and dining facilities. All 83 rooms are with charming interiors, decorated in style and artistic taste. You can taste authentic Indian delicacies in comfortable setting or even select from Indian, Mughlai, continental and Chinese offered in the restaurants. They are complimented with the drinks served from the bar and lounge.

4) Hyatt Regency Hotel: One of the most preferred among Delhi Hotels, the Hyatt Hotel is as impressive from inside as it is from outside. The 518 rooms are the most luxurious one comprising of necessary and luxury amenities along with 24 hours services. The hotel has a business center thus is among the top most choices of corporate guests. The hotel has the fine wine and dines facilities, serving their guests with delicious Indian and other multi-cuisines making your Delhi visit a memorable one.

Golden Triangle Dawn of Culture & History

Indian tourism is enjoying the purple phase with the set of globalization around the world and has been a major contributor to India’s state treasure. Incredible India is a land so unique that it attracts even the most critical of travelers to India for a delightful vacation. The terrain of India is bejeweled with myriad beauties of cultural heritage, natural heritage, and historical heritage that will leave you spellbind.

Its cultural heritage, historical heritage as well as will natural legacy will take you across the perfect blend of fortresses, palaces, monuments, architectural marvels, pilgrimage hubs, religious shrines, wildlife excursion, desert safari, fairs, festivals, shopping carnivals, delicious cuisines etc to call for an unforgettable holiday. It is next to impossible to cover the diverse India in a sole India tour. To capture the vast and scattered attractions one can embark on the Golden triangle India tours, which is a real essence of credulous India and seems like a dawn of culture & history.

The full of joy voyage of India covers the three illustrious cities of Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur. These cities are a perfect fusion of Rajput valor, Mughal dominion, and colonial rule. Apart from there powerful rule of bygone era one can also witness the redolent of Rajputs, royal panache of Mughal, and paw marks of colonial epoch a rare creation to enjoy. At the same time one cannot underestimate its striking modernity.

The highlights of Golden Triangle holidays in India will be an outing of bastions of primordial times, cultures, history, cuisines, shopping extravaganza, and frolicsome entertainments. The major attractions of Delhi are Red Fort, India Gate, Jama Maszid, Qutub Minar, Raj Ghat Gandhi Memorial, and festivals of Delhi. The major attractions of Jaipur are Amber Fort, Hawa Mahal, Jantar Mantar, The City Palace, and Jaipur Excursion. The major attractions of Agra are Taj Mahal, Agra Fort, Fatehpur Sikri, Itmad-Ud-Daulah Tomb, and Taj Mahotsav.

Unleash the Green Paradise on Earth with Kerala Tours

Kerala is one of the most famous destinations in India that is admired by people from far flung countries. It is Green Paradise of Earth, which is draped in every green beauty of nature. The green state is blessed with all expression of nature, including unmatched beauty of hill stations and picturesque backwaters, canals & rivers that is running in length and breadth at its end. In addition to this, Kerala also has wide stretches of beaches endowed with heavenly ambiance.
Kerala Tours are one such tour that has attracted not only local but also international travelers from all across the globe, giving them ample of opportunities to enjoy their vacations in this heavenly paradise. As, it is known as God’s Own Country bestowed with natural beauty and greenery it has been listed in World’s 50 must see destinations.
In this beautiful state you can also enjoy some adventure journeys as sightseeing of wildlife species or cruising slowly on backwaters with exclusive Kerala Backwater Toursbeautiful houseboats that are decorated spectacularly as mini home with bedroom, washrooms, a Deck to sit up on, etc. Some well known backwater destinations that are worth visiting during Tours in Kerala are Kovalam backwaters, Kumarakom, Kollam, Cochin, Kasargod, Kuttanad etc. Moreover, in these backwaters you can relish the water sports such as boating, wind surging, angling or rafting or just sit and enjoy panoramic view of the enthralling natural beauty. Make your tours more memorable with the tailor-made Kerala Tour Packages catering all your needs as per your wish and command.

Battle of Ultimate Luxury King

Delhi is a cosmopolitan city situated at the heart of incredible India and its versatile shades of glorious past is a treat to witness. If in Delhi Breathe the culture, feel the tangible, and wrap the magic of wonders of times. Delhi is an amalgamation of Mughal evocative, colonial fragrance, and stunning modernity that attract million of globe navigators from across the globe. The spirited flow of vacationers to the city for both pleasure as well as business purposes gives a boost to the demand of accommodations in Delhi. If you want to enjoy the hues of the city amidst royal luxury then you must opt for luxury hotels New Delhi.

The luxury hotels in the city comprises of globally acclaimed hotel chains beloved for their matchless guest satisfaction. The hotels are fighting hard to meet the client’s desire and are coming up with efforts that are above reproach. However, the two crown of luxury accommodations in Delhi that is giving a stiff competition to all the other brands is ITC Maurya Sheraton Delhiand Taj Mansingh Delhi.

These two tiaras of luxury accommodation are also battling it out to be the best hotel in Delhi and battle of ultimate luxury for king of retreats in Delhi seems to be to be anticipated. The most difficult task will be two choose the best among them on décor, accommodation facilities, guest conveniences, dine & wine as both seems to run almost parallel to each other. But there can be one King in one kingdom so the best will be decided by the ardent fans of luxury based on their amazing offers, special discounted tariffs, and not to miss the most important a sound marketing promotion.

Delhi, a hot Selling Destination of Golden Triangle Package

Delhi, situated in the heart of India, is the capital city of country and is one of the most admired destinations among tourists where amazing attractions galore. You can explore so much at each turn in this city of heart.

As you enter the city, you will find that it is dotted with significant and glorious history, which showcases a perfect blend of modernism and tradition aspects. You can experience all from rich culture of India in the form of cultural and historical monuments to modernity, depicted in its lifestyle.

Delhi is among one of the destinations of popular Golden Triangle Tour that takes you directly to heartland country i.e. on tour of tri city, Delhi, Agra and Jaipur. With this exclusive tour you can explore a lot in country.

Delhi Tours comprises in it wide range of attractions, all from heritage monuments to architectural marvels, museums, gardens, galleries, bazaars, cuisines, handicrafts, spiritual sites and much more, giving you a unique experience that would be cherishable lifelong.

Visit at least once and feel different flavors and colors of enchanting Delhi. Presently, it has become a hot spot selling destinations of India.

Here you can witness Red Fort, Chandani Chowk, Raj Ghat, Shanti Van, Humayun's Tomb, Purana Quila, India Gate, Qutub Minar, Rashtrapati Bhawan, Jantar Mantar, Jama Masjid, Safardarjung's Tomb and Rajghat and many other famous attractions lined by, each of them telling stories of royal and charming Delhi. Moreover, this Golden Triangle Indiadestination will fascinate its guests with its unparallel lifestyle.

Visit the Greenest Place in India with Kerala Tours

Kerala is situated on the southern tip of India with sapphire Arabian Sea on the west and the towering Western Ghats on the east and is one of the greenest places in India.

The charming and captivating Indian state is globally famous for its unique geographical and cultural features. Every year there is quite increase in Kerala Tours, as people prefer the state for eco tourism and cultural tours.

Tours to Kerala takes you into a unique world where superb natural beauty with mind-blowing greenery delights your mood & sooths your eyes. The exceptional greenery that you witness here makes this place breathtaking and heart grabbing.
The state is full of excursions such as beaches, backwaters, hill stations, waterfalls, lakes, wildlife parks, verdant landscapes, monuments, forts, palaces, temples, mosques, churches, ayurvedic resorts, spa centres, etc. In addition to this, you cannot ignore the taste of exotic cuisines, rich culture & traditions and various art forms of the state.

There are various unique Kerala Tour Packages that offer you with a memorable journey of lifetime. The most opted package is the Kerala Backwater tours Package that gives you an immense opportunity to explore the majestic & serene beauty of backwaters.

To add more fun & adventure to your tours go for Houseboat Cruise in Kerala that is well-organized with an array of facilities, making it a mini-home. Apart from it you can visit various hill stations where you can see superb nature beauty with agreeable climate. You can choose any of the places in the state as per your desire and enjoy the enchanting journey.

Golden Triangle Tour a Chance to Behold the Myriad Beauties

It seems like the apparent shadow on earth falls in India and its artistic natural loveliness is just incomparable. The land is also a versatile fusion of human creations, natural wonders multi-cultures, extraordinary history, delicious cuisines, and effervescent shopping carnivals. In India you have so much to explore that one lifetime is too short to arrest the countless beauties of India.

However, Indian tourism has designed the Golden triangle tour to capture the numerous colors of India in one tour. The tour covers the three illustrious cities of Delhi, Jaipur, and Agra. It brings you the evocative of Rajputs, Mughals, and colonial rule in India. The tour is the only option to behold the myriad beauties of India at one go.

Go Heritage India Journeys has planned some of the best itineraries of the tour to suit every vacationers plan and dish out an unforgettable holiday. If you planning to discover the astonishing shades of India you must book Golden triangle tour packageswith Go Heritage India Journeys. Call now the 24*7 helpline to avail the highest guaranteed discounts even if you are late nothing to worry 20% discount is fixed for all discerning travelers.

The highlights of the tour in Delhi are visit to India Gate, Red Fort, Raj Ghat Gandhi Memorial, Jama Maszid, Qutub Minar, Humayun’s tomb, restaurants, and shopping orb.

The overview of tour in the pink city of Jaipur will take you across Amber Fort, City Palace, Hawa Mahal, Jantar Mantar, Albert Hall Museum, Jaipur excursion, Rajasthani cookery, jewelry markets etc.

Agra will dig deep in to the Mughal architectural wonders of Taj Mahal, Agra Fort, Sikandra, Itmad-Ud-Daulah, Fatehpur Sikri, Taj Mahotsav, leather markets, Mughlai foods etc.

Crown of Delhi Hotels Shangri La Turns 40

The Shangri La Group which started in the year 1971 23rd April has celebrated its 40th birthday this year. The spokesperson of the luxury hotel was excited to state the media that the group is planning for some surprises to embark on a new journey of modern century. This enamoring hotel cluster was delighted to further add that it would host free dinner for all its loyal clients who are its active fan in Facebook until 31st December 2010.

The Shangri La is the crown of luxury hotels in New Delhi and in India, this tiara of lavish accommodation operates from the heart of Nation Delhi. Shangri La has always given a stiff competition to other illustrious Delhi hotels like, Oberoi Hotel, The Lalit, Imperial and many more.

Delhi is the true soul of India, which is full of generosity, color, magnificence, and erstwhile charm. To discover India one must go deep in to the core of Delhi the focal point of, this incredible nation. From ages, it has attracted globe navigators from across the cosmos for both business as well as pleasure purposes. Therefore, travelers who want to enjoy the hues of the city in the midst of royalty and grandiose must opt for the Delhi luxury hotels. To all travelers’ amazement, Go Heritage India Journeys is providing up to 50% discount in the booking of hotels in Delhi. Go Heritage India is an exclusive travel partner for Shangri La Hotels and provide the best tariff with discounts. They are the trusted partners of the global luxury chains and always step up to serve the guests.

Golden Triangle Tours Shoppers Heaven

India is an enormous land of multiplicity, history, culture, and civilizations that will be difficult to cover at one go. However to discover the heart of India the best option is to dig deep in to the Golden Triangle tour, which will take you across the real India and its stunning evolution. Golden triangle is all about a date with history, culture, and timeless grace of majestic aura. The tour will give you an insight of Rajput elegance, Mughal fragrance, and Colonial imprints.

The excursion covers the three illustrious cities of Delhi, Jaipur, and Agra, which illustrates the mini India. The expedition also gives you a chance to unfold the mysterious fortresses, palaces, wildlife safari, spiritual shrines, world heritage sites, and off course not to miss the one of seven wonder the Taj Mahal. But the real stars of the outing are the out of ordinary shopping sphere and food courts for relishing on delicacies that calls for a perfect holiday.

The tour is sojourn of heaven for all shopaholics and food lovers where one can purchase exotic items at amazing prices also go for window shopping amidst its countless market orbs at the same time when one feel hungry can switch to any world famous restaurants.

The shopping carnival in Delhi gets bigger, trendier, and is a fashion fiesta. The popular shopping hubs are Chandni Chowk, Connaught Place-showrooms, Palika Bazaar, Janpath market, Sarojini Nagar market, Shopping Malls, and Lajpat Nagar Central market. The famous food courts are Karim Restaurant and Moti Mahal from the scores of restaurants in Delhi.

The Jaipur shopping is all about ethnic items that take you across jewelry, paintings, leather ware, stone carving, textiles, and carpets. The food courts at Jaipur offer multi cuisines, Rajasthani delicacies, and take you across all Indian culinary journeys.

The last destination Agra is all about Mughal lifestyles and gives you an exceptional chance to witness the shopping purchasable from erstwhile era and taste the Mughlai foods.
